product_overview: Kafkasder Dernek Yönetim Sistemi is a comprehensive, modern, and secure association management platform designed for digitalizing all association operations using a scalable React and Supabase based web application.
core_goals: Provide a secure, performant, and scalable web platform for association operations.
Enable efficient member management including registration, search, and updates.
Facilitate comprehensive donation tracking and reporting with multiple payment methods.
Manage beneficiaries and aid applications with status tracking and document management.
Support detailed financial operations including income, expense tracking, and audit trails.
Deliver a rich user experience optimized for both desktop and mobile with accessibility compliance.
Ensure security with advanced protections like CSRF, XSS, rate limiting, and encrypted storage.
Offer analytical insights through dashboards with real-time metrics and reporting features.
Implement robust testing and monitoring to maintain quality and reliability.
Enable flexible deployment with best practices and environment configuration.
key_features: Authentication system integrated with Supabase supporting secure login, role-based permissions, and protected routes.
Member management module with CRUD, search, filtering, and bulk operations.
Donation management supporting multiple donation types, receipt generation, and detailed reports.
Beneficiary management with aid application workflow, case tracking, and document uploads.
Financial system covering income and expense tracking, category reports, and audit support.
Kumbara (collection box) management including location setup and collection recording.
Event and campaign management with scheduling, participant tracking, and progress analytics.
Internal messaging system supporting bulk and realtime communication.
Advanced search and filtering capability with global search features.
Comprehensive dashboard with real-time analytics and visualization charts.
Security features including CSRF protection, input validation, rate limiting, and data sanitization.
Offline support and PWA features with background sync capabilities.
Internationalization for multi-language support and accessibility enhancements adhering to WCAG 2.1 AA standards.
Extensive UI component library with accessibility and mobile optimization.
Robust error handling and performance optimization mechanisms.
File management with upload, storage, and OCR-based document processing.
user_flow_summary: User logs in securely via email and password with multi-factor authentication options.
User navigates app modules via responsive sidebar or mobile navigation menu.
User manages members by adding, updating, searching, and filtering member records.
User records donations specifying type, donor, amount, and payment method; generates receipts.
User enters beneficiary aid applications, reviews status, adds notes, and manages related documentation.
User tracks financial income and expenses, categorizes entries, and produces financial reports.
User creates and monitors campaigns and kumbara collection boxes with statistics.
User accesses dashboards for analytics and recent activity summaries.
User receives and manages notifications and internal messages.
User updates personal profile settings and preferences.
System performs offline data sync and handles network diagnostics transparently.
validation_criteria: Successful user authentication and authorization enforcing role-based access control.
All CRUD operations on members, donations, beneficiaries, and related entities function correctly.
Reports generate accurate data exportable in Excel and PDF formats.
Security measures including CSRF and rate limiting effectively prevent common attacks.
Mobile responsiveness and accessibility comply with WCAG 2.1 Level AA standards.
Performance benchmarks met including fast load times and optimized bundle size.
All forms include client and server side validation with helpful error messages.
Automated test coverage exceeds 80% including unit, integration, and E2E tests.
Offline mode and background sync features operate without data loss upon network recovery.
User notifications deliver real-time updates and correct categorization.
Deployment scripts and environment configurations function correctly as per documentation.
